hygiene and feeding practices, regular vaccinations for children, and routine care for 
pregnant women. Antiparastic medications and iron supplements were also provided, 
though problems with delivery and noncompliance for iron have been reported ( 7). Supply-
side enhancements to ensure access to health care and ability to meet conditions were 
implemented as well by providing funding to private providers (mostly NGOs).
